<script src="http://www.java.com/js/deployJava.js"></script>
		<script> 
        var attributes = { code:'net.ericaro.surfaceplotter.JSurfaceApplet',  width:564, height:452} ; 
        var parameters = {jnlp_href: '<codebase>/demo.jnlp'} ; 
        deployJava.runApplet(attributes, parameters, '1.5'); 
		</script>
